title: New Program Alert!
description:
Get the skills that keep industry moving with our brand-new Industrial Maintenance program at Arkansas Northeastern College! Whether you’re into automation, electrical work, or machining—this hands-on program gets you trained for the career that powers it all. Plus, thanks to Metallica's All Within My Hands Foundation, scholarships are now available!�
    Don't wait—this opportunity won’t last! To register for Fall classes:Come by campus,Call 870-838-2955 or Visit www.anc.edu/register
